basic.description: Students will perform in a public recital in accordance with guidelines established by the School of Music.
basic.subject: MUSC
basic.title: Applied Study III (Performance Recital)

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    BMUS students only
COREQUISITE    MUSC 320/6.0.
EXCLUSION    No more than 6.0 units from MUSC 321/6.0; MUSC 325/6.0.
